derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: perhaps from French chaudière 'stew pot', related to Old Northern French caudron (see cauldron)

entry.def: Chowder is a thick soup containing pieces of fish.

means.word_mean: 1. a thick soup or stew made with milk and bacon and onions and potatoes
